statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'student';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'instructor' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'student' ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role != 'admin' ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserAuth;
SELECT user_id, username FROM UserAuth;
SELECT password, username FROM UserAuth ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT permission_name FROM Permissions WHERE permission_id=1;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM UserAuth u JOIN Permissions p ON u.user_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM UserAuth ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM UserAuth WHERE password = '123456';

SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM UserAuth INNER JOIN AccessControls ON UserAuth.user_id = AccessControls.user_id INNER JOIN Permissions ON AccessControls.permission_id = Permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM AccessControls GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserAuth WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name='admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT users.user_id, users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_roles JOIN users ON user_roles.user_id = users.user_id WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT p.permission_name, r.role_name FROM permissions p JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id JOIN roles r ON rp.role_id = r.role_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;
